abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps retired doughnut maker Moshe Orlansky pay pharmacy bills after a medical crisis.
lead_paragraph: Moshe Orlansky, a former doughnut maker at Donut Delite Baking and Processing Company, faced surprising bills after a medical crisis.
snippet: Moshe Orlansky, a former doughnut maker at Donut Delite Baking and Processing Company, faced surprising bills after a medical crisis.

headline.main: A Business Collapse Froze His Income, and Then the Pharmacy Bills Came
